Header: New Building for Screening of Visitors Opened at Panagoda
Content: A new building that could properly document and screen all those arriving and departing from the Panagoda Army Cantonment on day to-day basis was established around the main entrance to the Panagoda Army Cantonment on Wednesday (5). This new location, a proposal of Major General Mahinda Mudalige, Commander Security Forces - West was opened in the presence of a gathering of Officers and Other Ranks.
